title: Constructing Creativity: How Science And Art Aren't So Far Apart
description:
After months of hard work, sweat, and cake tiers, Mindy is now ready to unveil her newly remodeled Gingerbread Palace! But when creativity leads to catastophe, it's up to Mindy, Guy, and their friends to fix this dessert designed disaster! So where do they even begin? By using creative problem solving skills from scientists AND artists! It's the Who, What, When, Where, Why, How and Wow in the World of CREATIVITY!
Want to learn more about the science behind creativity? Click here to see some of the resources we used to help write this episode!
Click here for a printable "Wowsheet" to help turn this episode of Wow in the World into a scientific learning adventure!
